title: WTB lower grade Tris Speaker (psa) with a common back

posts.post_title: WTB lower grade Tris Speaker (psa) with a common back

posts.post_content: More than happy to trade a Nap with bat psa 3….

Hi Jim,

I have a T206 Speaker PSA 4(MK) I’d be open to trading. It’s a nice 4 with overall attractive presentation with a Saturday Evening News back stamp. If you’re interested, please email me at: [url]jennings.eric@gmail.com[/url]
